column5: What happened to the advertising in the upper right hand corner?? Just google ads now? Some of those banners led to some great info!   I should add all I ever see is the Sea-Doo ad.... is it just me?  Gerritt.
Ummm they are htere.... you must have an ad blocker working???
mine have disappeared too..hmm...I didn't enable an ad blocker...a pop up blocker yes, but not an ad blocker....
I see them!  Joey
There's one up there for Moose Horn Lodge right now... Gerritt and Cliff... y'all are wierd!
oh....shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh they don't show up in firefox don't tell anyone

Hmmmm.. Digital Solutions.   Maybe that is how you can turn a 5-6 pound bass into something 2 to 3 times that size.    Now we know how he did it.  Just wait until I get my 70# musky.  Oops ... Memquisit is there now.   Sorry.
Im using firefox...
really...they do not show up here... when on firefox but do if I go on iexplorer
They show up on my Firefox.
When bly is logged in the one in the top right corner appears, but when I log in they are not there....  Strange....

I am using firefox and not seeing a thing.... just Sea-Doo over and over....  Certainly there has to be a work around....They were working before w/ Firefox.... those ads pay for this site! I would click them because alot of them were useful and helped me choose destinations!  Gerritt.
Guess you just have to be "special" to see the adds
they don't show up in the default skin club skin they show up.......
Terry you are quite right.... change the skin and they appear... it is not a firefox issue but a programming/CSS/Java? issue.... good catch and nice eye.   Gerritt.
I hate an unsolved mystery ......
I will disable teh default skin till we can find the issue. We had some troubles with the software before, so there may be a file pathway error.
it's back I see ads
Not working here with the driftwood skin.  Gerritt.
Same here Gerritt...no go on the driftwood skin...all others seem to be ok though.
For Firefox 2.0 with Ad Block Plus, when I say "disable on www.ofncommunity.com" from the ad block icon then the Ads do appear.
